summary: three vehicles collided on the brisbane valley highway , 2km south of fernvale , on wednesday afternoon . a 40-year-old man with chest and shoulder injuries and a five-year-old boy with chest pain were the first patients flown out by rescue helicopter . they 've been taken to the princess alexandra hospital in brisbane . shortly after , a 27-year-old woman with arm injuries and a six-year-old girl suffering from abdominal pain were also being flown out . the three car pileup happened at on the brisbane valley highway , near fernvale .
